name: Rynosaur Land Prototype
description:
Retro platformer heavily inspired by a certain jumping plumber.

This was originally a part of Kouryaku Collection, my submission to the OpenGameArt.org Late Fall 2021 Jam. The original version is lost and was removed by me from the jam, due to a rage-delete incident prompted by my disgust with itch.io's extremely inadequate content moderation when it comes to perverted content. But digress, now do I.

Controls:

Keyboard:

Move – Arrow Keys

Jump – Z, X, C Keys

Start/Pause – Return Key

Gamepad:

Move – Dpad

Jump – A, B, X Buttons

Start/Pause – Start Button
